participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, enjoys outdoor activities and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: My favorite color is orange. I turned 18 years old yesterday. I have a pet fish. I like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. I just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, passionate about teaching and loves to explore different cultures.
participant_2.background: I am fluent in English, Spanish and French. My boyfriend and I are moving into an apartment together next week. My favorite colors are red and silver. I am interested in photography and like taking pictures. I am an elementary school teacher.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Pretty good, I'm excited for my upcoming move!
Oh, that's cool! Where are you moving to?
I'm moving into an apartment with my boyfriend.
That's great! How long have you been together?
We've been together for about a year now.
Congratulations!
Thanks!
So, what are you most excited about about moving in together?
I'm excited to have more space, and to be able to cook more often.
That's awesome! I love cooking too.
Me too! I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it.
Well, we can always cook together!
I'd love that!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, go to the movies, and play video games.
That's cool! I like to do all of those things too.
We should hang out sometime!
I'd love to!
Great! I'll send you my number.
